title: Neo in the Matrix
description: Neo lives a double life as a programmer and hacker. Besides his lingering sense that something is wrong with the world, he is generally unaware of the Matrix, nor does he understand his role in it.

title: Trinity explains the call
description: At a night club, Neo meets Trinity, who addresses his suspicions about there being something more to his world. She explains that he needs to continue searching for the truth, but that he is also in danger.

title: Neo fails to follow Morpheus' instructions
description: When Morpheus first contacts Neo and directs him to escape from the agents, Neo hesitates and fails to follow directions, resulting in his capture.

title: Trinity removes the parasite
description: When in a car with Trinity and her team, Neo at first tries to leave. However, following Trinity's advice, Neo decides to stay in the car. Trinity and her team then use advanced technology to remove the parasitic, robotic insect that had been placed in his body previously by the agents.

title: Neo's awakening
description: After Neo takes the red pill, he crosses the boundary between the simulated reality of the Matrix and the real world, waking up in a pod filled with fluid.

title: Neo in the belly of the human farms
description: In the real world, Neo is routed through the many interconnected pipes and channels which support the human-battery farms built by the machines. At this stage, he has very little control of his path, and is at the mercy of the the new environment he has entered.

title: Neo fails his training
description: While training with Morpheus in the construct, Neo faces a series of physical and mental tests to prepare him for the challenges he will face in the Matrix. At first, he fails at these tests in many different ways, causing others and himself to doubt his potential.

title: Neo meets the Oracle
description: Neo meets the Oracle, who provides him with insight, encouragement, and wisdom. She enhances Neo's understanding of the concepts of free will, determinism, and the importance of the phrase "Temet Nosce", or "Know Thyself".

title: Neo is tempted by self-doubt
description: The Oracle causes Neo to reveal his own doubts about himself, and allows him to assess on his own that he is not "The One". Thus, he is tempted by his own self-doubt to abandon his quest.

title: Neo is shot by Agent Smith
description: Neo has his first direct confrontation with Agent Smith, who represents the ultimate authority within the Matrix. During their encounter, Neo is overpowered and nearly killed.

title: Neo sees the true nature of the Matrix
description: After being resurrected by Trinity's kiss, during a short period of peace, Neo experiences a profound transformation in which he fully embraces his identity as "The One". He gains a deeper understanding of the Matrix and his role within it.

title: Neo defeats Agent Smith
description: After realizing his true powers, Neo confronts Agent Smith once again. This time, he is able to effortlessly defeat Smith, demonstrating his mastery over the Matrix and solidifying his status as "The One".

title: Neo's reluctance to leave the Matrix
description: After defeating Agent Smith, Neo is reluctant to take the phone call and leave the Matrix for a short time. He considers staying inside the Matrix to continue fighting the other agents.

title: Sentinels breach the Nebuchadnezzar
description: Neo's return to the "real world" is complicated by the Sentinels piercing inside the Nebuchadnezzar, placing Neo and the crew in direct, immediate danger. If he is killed while still inside the Matrix, he will not be able to safely return to the real world.

title: Trinity helps Neo escape the Matrix alive
description: Trinity's love rescues Neo from certain death as he is being attacked by the Sentinels. Neo is brought back to the real world just in time to evade death.

title: Neo's phone call
description: Neo once again enters into the Matrix, but now as a much more empowered Hero.

title: Neo leaves the phone booth
description: Neo exits the phone booth, symbolizing his ability to operate within the Matrix while maintaining agency in the real world.

title: Neo flies
description: Neo has achieved supreme mastery over the Matrix, symbolized by his ability to fly. He now has full control over both worlds, and is free to live as he chooses.
